rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BUS2021, CPE2003, CSE1204, CSE1205, GCO1813, GCO2601, GCO2826, GCO2852, IMS1001, IMS1002, IMS1805, IMS2071, IMS9001}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BUS2021, CPE2003, CSE1204, CSE1205, GCO1813, GCO2601, GCO2826, GCO2852, IMS1001, IMS1002, IMS1805, IMS2071, IMS9001}
Must have passed 24 (I/W) credit points from units owned by {50000566}

For commencement date before `01-JAN-2011` Do For COURSE_CODE IN {2380, 2617, 2770, 3517} Do Any passed co-req (I/W) unit in {FIT1004, FIT1008, FIT2010} Otherwise Any passed co-req (I/W) unit in {FIT1004, FIT2010} Otherwise Any passed co-req (I/W) unit in {FIT1004, FIT2010}

description: The unit introduces students to systems analysis and design as a problem solving activity, within the framework of a selected methodology. It will focus on contemporary industry practice; investigating understanding and documenting system requirements; a range of design and implementation activities; and professional skills required for systems development.
